hooks.prompt:
At the start of this session, check if the project's CLAUDE.md needs updating:

1. Read ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md to see the current global @include directives
2. Read the project's ./CLAUDE.md (if it exists)
3. If the project is missing @include directives that are in the global file, update the project CLAUDE.md to match
4. Consider project type (Elixir projects need elixir-*.md includes, Phoenix needs phoenix-*.md, etc.)
5. Report what you updated, or confirm they're in sync

Do this silently unless there are changes to make.
